definition: the adjustment of a radio receiver or other circuit to a required frequency, adjust the pitches of musical instruments
details:
noun
- the adjustment of a radio receiver or other circuit to a required frequency
- the property of producing accurately a note of a given pitch
= example: the property of producing accurately a note of a given pitch
- a succession of notes forming a distinctive sequence
= synonyms: air
verb
- adjust the pitches of musical instruments
= example: adjust the pitches of musical instruments
= synonyms: tune up
- adjust for (better) functioning
= example: adjust for (better) functioning
= synonyms: tune up
